law.catch_line: From among its members, the Commission annually shall elect a chairman and a vice chairman, provided...

section.section:
From among its members, the Commission annually shall elect a chairman and a vice chairman, provided:
if a chair is elected from among the real estate appraiser members, then the vice chairman shall be elected from among the licensed home inspector members; and
if a chair is elected from among the licensed home inspector members, then the vice chairman shall be elected from among the real estate appraiser members.
At the end of a term, the chairman and vice chairman may be reelected.

text.section: The chairman shall perform the duties that this title and the Commission require.
While in office, the chairman shall be covered by a surety bond in the form and amount required by law.
